title: Surya S/O Krishnan
description: Playing a duel role of a father and son is Surya (of Sillunu Oru Kaadhal and Vel fame). The movie shows how the father meets his ladylove and marries her, and how his son now relates to the women in his life and the lessons he learns from it. Also featured are Simran and Sameera Reddy, who play the mother and love interest respectively. Written, directed and produced by Gautam Menon, the movie is slated to be released in Tamil and Telugu.
